Question:
What kind of H/W safety feature s in RA2L1/RA2E1/RA2E2/RA2E3/RA2A2 ?
Answer:
The  RA2L1/RA2E1/RA2E2/RA2E3/RA2A2 has a number of safety functions that allow confirmation of normal operation.
1. Error detection
Independent Watchdog timer (IWDT)
Flash memory CRC calculation
SRAM parity error detection
SRAM ECC function (Available in only the RA2L1, RA2A1, RA2A2)
Main oscillator stop detection (except RA2E2)
Sub and Main oscillator stop detection circuit for SDADC24 clock switch (Available for RA2A2)
2. Memory Guard
Illegal memory access
Flash area protection
SFR write protection
3. Fault detection
Frequency detection
Port Output Enable for GPT
A/D self-check test
GPIO readback level detection
Clock Frequency Accuracy Measurement Circuit
Data Operation Circuit
Customers can use these functions to easily perform self-diagnostics on microcontrollers.
Suitable Products
RA2L1, RA2A1, RA2E1, RA2E2, RA2E3, RA2A2
